name: Lynn , The Girl Drawn On Puzzles
name_original: Lynn , The Girl Drawn On Puzzles
description:
Lynn : The Girl Drawn On Puzzles

A story of Lynn, a girl who was transported into an oriental painting.

Various puzzle elements and over 100 levels
In addition to the basic rules of the game, puzzle objects, and items that interest users are introduced
Produced over a hundred levels developed with additional elements
The rules with unique concept induce interest and curiosity from the users as they play the game
The elements added as the stages evolve to provide the users with the desire to challenge, as well as a sense of achievement.


Easy move, difficult thinking
A new type of puzzle rules that controls the room, not the characters
Simple rules as it only need a simple control
Still requires a lot of thinking and calculating in order to solve the puzzle

The game has a new rule of moving the characters by moving the rooms, and the graphic and art provide a fun element that is visually different with the story of a character who came inside the oriental painting.
